{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=libfund_ts |
constexpr const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl | since=libfund_ts |
constexpr const_reverse_iterator crbegin() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns a reverse iterator to the first character of the reversed view. It corresponds to the last character of the non-reversed view.

{{image|range-rbegin-rend.svg}}

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{tt|const_reverse_iterator}} to the first character

===Complexity===
Constant
